FuncDef: The arp resource-mode command sets the ARP resource allocation mode. The arp resource-mode command sets the ARP resource allocation mode. By default, the global ARP resource allocation mode is used. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the global ARP resource allocation mode.
-

Sets the extended ARP resource allocation mode.
-
